io.spine.server.delivery

Class InProcessSharding

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.delivery.InProcessSharding
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sharding

    public class InProcessSharding
extends java.lang.Object
implements Sharding
    An implementation of the sharding service, that manages all the data in-memory and runs only within the current JVM process.

    Must not be used in production mode. Designed primarily for local testing purposes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      InProcessSharding(TransportFactory transportFactory)
      Creates a new instance of in-process sharding service, which uses the given transport factory to manage the channels for the sharded message streams.

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public final void register(Shardable shardable)
        Registers a shardable instance.

        After the registration the shardable starts to be served with the messages targeting the instances which belong to its shard.

        Specified by:
        register in interface Sharding
        Parameters:
        shardable - a shardable to register

      • unregister

        public final void unregister(Shardable shardable)
        Description copied from interface: Sharding
        Unregister a shardable instance.

        After this operation, the messages are no longer dispatched to the shards of this shardable.

        Has no effect if there is no such a shardable registered.

        Specified by:
        unregister in interface Sharding
        Parameters:
        shardable - a shardable instance to unregister

      • pickKeysForNode

        public java.util.Set<ShardingKey> pickKeysForNode(Shardable shardable,
                                                  java.util.Set<ShardingKey> keys)
        Defines the sharding keys for the given shardable to be served within this Sharding instance.
        Specified by:
        pickKeysForNode in interface Sharding
        Parameters:
        shardable - the shardable to define the keys for
        keys - all the sharding keys to pick those to handle within this instance
        Returns:
        the set of keys to serve within this sharding instance

                                                                                                   I targetId)
        Finds the message streams which delivery tag and target entity identifier match the specified values.
        Specified by:
